title: SHANG CHI: Wong and ABOMINATION Fight EXPLAINED | Thunderbolts DARK AVENGERS Breakdown
author: ScreenCrush
comment: What other Incredible Hulk actor returned to the MCU?

I totally forgot that we were all wondering how She-Hulk would get her powers if Bruce was Professor Hulk still, didn’t even cross my mind when we saw Bruce at the end of Shang-Chi! That makes so much sense.
Spiderman's teacher was in the Incredible Hulk. He was bribed with the pizza like he was a ninja turtle or something
Almost had me, it’s the guy who plays Peter’s teacher, he’s working at the lab at the college or something.
Bertram Gilfoyle has his own secret super powers. And no, its not pink eye.
